name: The Master 师父
description:
I’ve just killed a stranger for my master.

A blind fortune teller stopped me on the street. He said I'm a dutiful son.
I laughed, I have no father or mother, I was adopted by my master as a kid.
He sniffed my sword, then said the blood that covers it belongs to my father.
How did the fortune teller know?
When I looked up, the fortune teller was already gone.

I need the truth from my master.

--

The Master 师父 (shīfu, sensei) is a short wuxia combat platformer about the final fight between you and your master. 

Made by: Fan Fang, Gil Lawson, Mai Hou, Yamiao Liu 
For the Game Studio 2 Course at NYU Game Center.

Instructors: Robert Yang, Maria Mishurenko, Steph Clark

Controls: Xbox Controller or Mouse+Keyboard, explained in-game.

--

NOTE: The development is currently on hold.
